channel.title: About the Redbol category
channel.description:
Issues regarding compatibility and emulation of Rebol2 and Red.
It's generally a goal that Ren-C be able to bend in order to do most anything that Rebol2 or Red can do...with modest effort. Pursuant to that goal is the [Redbol module](https://forum.rebol.info/t/beginnings-of-the-redbol-module/755) to have an actual emulation of a reasonable compatible subset of the languages.
More generally, this category could be for discussing anything related to Rebol2 or Red semantics or features.
